https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3r1AumUvcB45JWN4SJMrFYDbRrn.jpg A masked maniac with a penchant for a monster-themed board game is playing his own twisted game with the women of a small American town. Each time the dice are rolled, another victim meets a grisly end. Returning home to mourn the death of her murdered sister, Keegan befriends local cop Roger and reclusive cinema projectionist Billy â€” but soon finds herself in the killer's sights. Deadly Games
